title: kaNNanai paNi
sahitya:
kaNNanaip-paNi manamE dinamE


anupallavi

  maNNil yashOdai shEi puNya svarUpanai


mAdhavanai namadu yAdava dhIpanaik-caraNam 1    pANDavar nEyanai bhakthar sahAyanai
pavazha shevvAyanai paramanai mAyanaik-
  caraNam 2    mangaLa mUlanai gOkula bAlanai
maNamighu tuLaSsI mAlanai pAlanai
  caraNam 3    viNNavar pOTravE maNNil varum vEdap
paNNanai shyAmaLa vaNNanai tAmaraik-
